languages.text: Enemies that are {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by this weapon suffer an irradiated effect that lasts for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g}, decreasing all healing received by −50%. Also prevents using Reanimation Protocol for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.
languages.original_text: На противников, получивших {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g} этим оружием, на 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} накладывается эффект облучения, который на −50% снижает эффективность любого получаемого лечения. Также предотвращает использование Протокола реанимации в течение 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раундов{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Enemies that are {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}hit{/g} by this weapon suffer an irradiated {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} that lasts for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g}, decreasing all healing received by 50%.

Enemies that are {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by this weapon suffer an irradiated effect that lasts for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g}, decreasing all healing received by −50%. Also prevents using Reanimation Protocol for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

Также предотвращает использование Протокола реанимации в течение 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раундов{/g}.

Also prevents using Reanimation Protocol for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: На противников, получивших {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}попадание{/g} этим оружием, на 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} накладывается {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}эффект{/g} облучения, который на 50% снижает эффективность любого получаемого лечения.

На противников, получивших {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}попадание{/g} этим оружием, на 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} накладывается {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}эффект{/g} облучения, который на −50% снижает эффективность любого получаемого лечения. Также предотвращает использование Протокола реанимации в течение 3 раундов.

languages.text: 这把武器{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}目标时，会对目标施加“辐射”效果，持续3{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}。受“辐射”效果影响的目标受到的所有治疗效果降低50%。此外，目标在三{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}之内无法使用重塑协议。
languages.original_text: Enemies that are {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by this weapon suffer an irradiated effect that lasts for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g}, decreasing all healing received by −50%. Also prevents using Reanimation Protocol for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 这把武器{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}目标时，会对目标施加“辐射”{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}效果{/g}，持续3{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}。受“辐射”效果影响的目标受到的所有治疗效果降低50%。

languages.text: この武器の攻撃が{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}した敵は、3{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}続く照射効果にかかり、受けるすべての治癒効果が−50%減少する。また3{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、蘇生プロトコルを使用できなくなる。
languages.original_text: Enemies that are {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by this weapon suffer an irradiated effect that lasts for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g}, decreasing all healing received by −50%. Also prevents using Reanimation Protocol for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 攻撃が{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}した敵は3{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の間照射{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}効果{/g}を受け、受けるすべての治癒効果が50%減少。

languages.text: Los enemigos que reciban {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impactos{/g} de esta arma sufren el efecto irradiado que permanece durante 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turnos{/g}, y provoca la disminución del −50 % de toda la curación recibida. Además impide usar Protocolo de reanimación durante 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asaltos{/g}.
languages.original_text: Enemies that are {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by this weapon suffer an irradiated effect that lasts for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g}, decreasing all healing received by −50%. Also prevents using Reanimation Protocol for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Los enemigos que reciban {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}impactos{/g} de esta arma sufren el {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}efecto{/g} irradiado que permanece durante 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turnos{/g}, y provoca la disminución del 50 % de toda la curación recibida.

languages.text: Feinde, die von dieser Waffe {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}getroffen{/g} werden, erleiden den Effekt Verstrahlt, der 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Züge{/g} lang anhält und sämtliche erhaltenen Heilungen um −50 % reduziert. Verhindert außerdem 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g} lang die Verwendung von Reanimationsprotokoll.
languages.original_text: Enemies that are {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by this weapon suffer an irradiated effect that lasts for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g}, decreasing all healing received by −50%. Also prevents using Reanimation Protocol for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Feinde, die von dieser Waffe {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}getroffen{/g} werden, erleiden den {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}Effekt{/g} Verstrahlt,der 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Züge{/g} lang Bestand hat und sämtliche erhaltenen Heilungen um 50 % reduzieren.

languages.text: Les ennemis {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touchés{/g} par cette arme subissent l'effet Irradiation pendant 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tours{/g}, ce qui réduit de −50 % tous les soins reçus. Empêche également l'utilisation du Protocole de Réanimation pendant 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.
languages.original_text: Enemies that are {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} by this weapon suffer an irradiated effect that lasts for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turns{/g}, decreasing all healing received by −50%. Also prevents using Reanimation Protocol for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Les ennemis {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}touchés{/g} par cette arme subissent l'{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effet{/g} Irradiation pendant 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tours{/g}, ce qui réduit de 50 % tous les soins reçus.
